title: Kiss The Girl
lyrics: There you see her sitting there across the way She don't got a lot to say but there s something about her And you don't know why but you're dying to try You wanna kiss the girl Yes you want her look at her you know you do It's possible she wants you too there is one way to ask her No It don't take a word not a single word go on and kiss the girl Sha la la la la la My oh my look at the boy too shy don t wanna kiss the girl Sha la la la la la Ain't that sad ain t it a Shame too bad you gonna Miss the girl go on and kiss the girl kiss the girl Now's your moment floating in a blue lagoon Boy you better do it soon no time will be Better She don t say a word and she won t say a word until you Kiss the girl Shalalalala My oh my boy's too shy kiss the girl Shalalalala Ain't that sad shame Too bad, you're gonna miss the girl Shalalalala Don't be scared You better be prepared Go on and kiss the girl Shalalalala Don't stop now Don't try to hide it how You wanna kiss the girl Shalalalala My oh myyyyy Looks like the boy's too shy kiss the girl Shalalalala Ain't that sad shame miss the girl
